page.title: 03FENSTANTON SCHOOL
page.content: In our{school}there are 11{teachers. The{headmaster}is called{Mr Wallace. There is{1 secretary,348 children}and { 2 helpers.93 children are from Hilton the other{255 children from Fenstanton We have{2 playgrounds}43m by 14m and 33m by 33m.We have a{field}that is 9 acres.In{1955}all children went to church centre. In{1959}3 classrooms were built.So children moved over into them.In{1963 4 more classrooms were built.By{1979 the whole school was built.In{1979,}3 new classrooms and a staffroom were built for the upper juniors.We have{2 {mobiles}as well. In our{school playground}we have an oldest tree,about{100}years old.It is an{elm tree}and it is 2m 38cm wide.It is{9m tall}and is very twiggy.It has no leaves just{weeds}that grow out from the{bark.
